topic.title: What is a good use case for 0net (or a decentralized web in general)?
topic.body: I love the idea of a decentralized web. What do you think would be a good application of it today? Obviously, illegal content etc can be hosted without being taken down, ok. But apart from that, can you think of a use case that you would like to see?

4_15Q5U52Aqgjb66GkzhkGKDYgWsqR8TEkJG.body: Or how about an automod? Shouldn't be too hard to detect chinese content...
